channel.title: [PI] Disabling Dueling [PI]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape! I'm here today with a question, How would I go about disabling dueling, and making it send a message to your chat box when you try to duel, that it is temporarily disabled?
Thanks guys!

item.title: [PI] Disabling Dueling [PI]
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

I think this is the duel, fight pits dupe and i recommend that you place objects for fight pits which is the easiest solution. But for disabeling duel i think you have to go in ur config.java which is in ur server files.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Disabling Dueling [PI]
item.dc:creator: @LogicalTwink LogicalTwink
item.description:
@LogicalTwink wrote:

Well thats the thing! There is a duplication glitch that uses 3 players, I don’t want this abused so I would like to close dueling for the time being, currently, it doesn’t say anything. It just sends the duel request.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Disabling Dueling [PI]
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:

It’s time to d-d-d-d-d-d-d-duel!

What does it currently say when you try to duel someone?
